Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_00>Well, look who it is. <sp:5:0:0>I sure can't thank
you enough for helping our mini stable
come together.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Heard me talking to myself, did you?<sp:0:4:0>Spot is the name of my beloved horse,
you see...
Talk_0001: <sp:3:0:2:0a00><clr:0000><snd:Sad_01><clr:ffff>Oh, <clr:0000>Spot<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0> Where did you get off to?
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>Well, look who it is. Overheard my
worrying, did you? Spot's my horse.
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Truth be told, he's missing. Ran away just
before the stable was built.

Well, he's always been a meek horse,
so I <clr:0000>can't imagine he's run off too far<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Understand_00>He's beautiful. Just one look at his silky,
<clr:0000>gentle beige <clr:ffff>coat and you'd know it
was him.
Course, you'd recognize his unique <clr:0000>gray
dappling<clr:ffff> too. That's the reason I call him
Spot in the first place!
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Sigh_01>A horse like him, I bet you he's someplace
with a nice view, taking in the sights.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Just wish I didn't have so much trouble
climbing to <clr:0000>high places<clr:ffff> these days.
Talk_0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Huh?<sp:5:0:0> H-hey...<sp:5:0:0> Isn't that Spot you've
got there?!
Talk_0013: <sp:3:0:2:0a00>Worse yet, he's caught in this lousy rain...
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_01>Spot! It's really you! <sp:5:0:0>Are you hurt?
Hungry?

Oh, Spot...<sp:5:0:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>You had me worried sick. What if you were
attacked by monsters out there?
Talk_0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_00>Ah, my apologies... <sp:5:0:0>Spot here is a dear
friend of mine.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Thing is, he ran away just before this
stable was built...
Talk_0014: <sp:3:0:2:0a00>I hope this thunder doesn't scare him...
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Trouble>Running around under that big blue sky,
mane blowing in the wind...munching on
grass with the rest of his herd...
I really can't blame Spot for wanting to
live like a wild horse again.<sp:5:2:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand_00>I'm sorry. I know you went through all that
trouble to bring him back to me...

But he deserves a freer life than I can give
him. It's time for me to let him go.
Talk_0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>He ran off on me just before the stables
were built.

I call him Spot because of his unique
<clr:0000>gray dappling<clr:ffff>. He's one of a kind.
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Well, it looks like I'm in your debt yet
again. Thank you so much for bringing
my Spot back to me.
It's not much, but here's a little reward
for reuniting me with my best friend.
Talk_0006: <sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sigh_00>If only I'd kept a better eye on him...
Talk_0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Hm? Seems like your pouch is full up.


I was planning on rewarding you with a
<clr:0000>swift carrot<clr:ffff>. They're pretty rare around
these parts, you know.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>I'd appreciate it if you'd come see me
again after you free up some space.
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Happy_01>Or maybe I should give him to a fine
young horseman like yourself. As long
as he's happy, I'll be happy.
Oh, that reminds me. Please, take this.
Talk_0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Huh. Your pouch still looks full there.


Well, once you make some room, I still
have a <clr:0000>swift carrot <clr:ffff>with your name on it.
They're pretty rare around here.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>I'd be glad if you came back again after
you freed up some space.
Talk_0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>So you freed up some pouch space, huh?
Great. Then this is all yours.
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>That there is a <clr:0000>swift carrot<clr:ffff>.


It's a signature crop of <clr:0000>Kakariko Village <clr:ffff>in
Necluda, down to the southeast of here.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>Hylian or horse, you take a bite of one of
those, and you'll find a little more pep in
your step.
<snd:Chat_01>Spot and I used to split swift carrots
all the time back in the day...

<snd:LaughS_00>It would make me happy if you split that
with your favorite horse too.
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Understand_00>His coat's a gentle <clr:0000>beige with gray
dappling<clr:ffff>. Hence the name.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>I bet that if you went <clr:0000>somewhere with a
good view<clr:ffff>, you'd find him in no time.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I would go look myself, but climbing up
high isn't so easy for me anymore...
